==== Keep Up To Date ====

To get involved in our community join one of our resources:

* Join the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/loco-contacts|loco-contact mailing list]]</nowiki>.
* Join the <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net?channels=ubuntu-locoteams|#ubuntu-locoteams]]</nowiki> IRC channel on <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/using_the_network.shtml|freenode]]</nowiki>.
* Join the <nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/group/ubuntulocoteams|ubuntulocoteams group]]</nowiki> on identi.ca.

More details about using these resources is available <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamContacts|here]]</nowiki>.

==== See! ====

Go and look at photos of LoCo Team meetings Flickr by <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/search/show/?q=ubuntu+loco|clicking here]]</nowiki>
